pages.text: $(li)The Enderiophage is virus-like creature that can be found in the End Midlands.$(br)$(li)They travel by floating around the End searching Endergrade.$(br)$(li)They may drop a Capsid on death.

$(li)When this creature finds an Endergrade, it with infect it with Ender Flu.$(br)$(li)If you attack them, they will infect you as well.$(br)$(li)This effect make the victim to receive a lot of instant damage after 10 minutes.$(br)$(li)This effect can be healed eating a Chorus Fruit.
